tooltips.enabled: When enabled, customers will earn points for every purchase based on the settings below. Disabling this will stop all point accumulation.
tooltips.baseAmount: This is the transaction amount required to earn 1 point. For example, if set to 10,000, then a 50,000 purchase will earn 5 points (before multipliers).
tooltips.pointMultiplier: A global multiplier applied to all point calculations. For example, setting this to 2 will double all points earned by all customers.
tooltips.tierMultiplier: Each membership tier has its own multiplier that is applied after the global multiplier. Higher tiers receive more points for the same purchase amount.
tooltips.exampleCalculation: Enter any amount to see how many points each tier would earn for this purchase.
